cause.description:
communism may seem like a lovable idea at first, all it is is slavery of innocent people. it must be eliminated throughout the world. if you had a degree and a well paying job, would you like it stripped from you just so that your welfare reliant trailer trash neighbor didnt have to suffer and learn from his mistakes? i think not. DOWN WITH COMMUIST BELEIFS!
1. Communism doesnt work
2. our country can defeat communism
3. we WILL defeat it
4. and billary is communist, so dont vote for her
cause.mission: get communists and hilary clinton out of the USA
cause.name: Eliminate Communism
